lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee (IOC) has called on Tokyo to show a sense of urgency about finalizing its budget for the 2020 Summer Games, noting that costs will continue to increase the longer it takes

headline.print_headline: IOC Urges Tokyo to Set Budget Soon to Cut Costs Further
headline.main: IOC Urges Tokyo to Set Budget Soon to Cut Costs Further
